#summary This page guides you with installation of Small Business Site Template for SharePoint 2010

== Prerequisites == 
  
  # !SharePoint 2010 
  # Visual Studio 2010 (To Customize the template)

== Template Installation ==
  # Download ZIP package from [http://code.google.com/p/visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template/downloads/detail?name=SharePoint%20Project%20Template%20C%23%201.0.vsix&can=2&q=#makechanges here]
  # This package contains a WSP file and a *Install.bat* Batch file to add and deploy the wsp to !SharePoint.
  # Edit the Install.bat file and update the *SITE-URL* parameter to specify the web application url to deploy the package to. Save and close the file.
  # Execute the Install.bat file. The package will be added and deployed to the site specified in the bat file. Refer to the screenshot below:<br/>	[https://free-sharepoint-small-business-website-template-theme.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images]
  # Verify the installed package in !SharePoint Central Administration, by going to Start -> All Programs -> Microsoft !SharePoint 2010 Products -> !SharePoint 2010 Central Administration.<br/>	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/CentralAdmin.jpg<br/>	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/SystemSettings.jpg<br/>	http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/Images/ValidateDeployment.jpg
  # This confirms the package has been successfully installed and deployed to !SharePoint
